title: Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life
author: Héctor García and Francesc Miralles
description: Ikigai reveals the secrets to their longevity and happiness: how they eat, how they move, how they work, how they foster collaboration and community.

title: The Art of Making Memories: How to Create and Remember Happy Moments
author: Meik Wiking
description: The Art of Making Memories examines how mental images are made, stored, and recalled in our brains, as well as the 'art of letting go.'

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby follows a cast of characters living in the fictional town of West Egg on prosperous Long Island in the summer of 1922.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: To Kill a Mockingbird explores the irrationality of adult attitudes toward race and class in the Deep South of the 1930s.

author: George Orwell
description: 1984 is set in a dystopian future where critical thought is suppressed under a totalitarian regime. The protagonist, Winston Smith, wrestles with oppression.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Pride and Prejudice follows the emotional development of Elizabeth Bennet, who learns the error of making hasty judgments and appreciates the essential.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: The Catcher in the Rye recounts the days following sixteen-year-old Holden Caulfield's expulsion from Pencey Prep, his journey home to Manhattan, and his encounters.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: The Alchemist follows Santiago, a young Andalusian shepherd in his journey to Egypt, after having a recurring dream of finding treasure there.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The Hobbit follows the quest of home-loving hobbit Bilbo Baggins to win a share of the treasure guarded by the dragon, Smaug.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone follows Harry Potter's first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring follows Frodo Baggins and his companions as they set out to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: The Da Vinci Code follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu as they investigate a murder in the Louvre Museum, leading to a trail of clues.
